action.name: Multiattack
text: The deathspitter makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Spit Poison
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, a creature that fails its saving throw is blinded until the end of the deathspitter's next turn.
